description: The results of executing a qobj
title: qobj results

$eref.description: JSON representation of a complex vector

_88complex.description: JSON representation of a complex number

_88complex_array.description: JSON representation of a complex vector

$eref.description: JSON representation of a complex number

___meas_return.description: Is the data averaged or from each shot

___status.description: Human-readable description of status of this experiment

___header.description: Header passed through from the qobj with experiment metadata

___shots.description: The starting and ending shot for this data. If there is only one shot to the experiment this is [1,1]

___success.description: If true, we can trust results for this experiment.

$eref.description: JSON representation of a complex matrix

___counts.description: Histogram of the memory over the indicated shots

$eref.description: JSON representation of a complex vector

___snapshots.description: collection of all snapshots of simulator state

___status.description: Human-readable status of complete qobj execution

___backend_version.description: Backend version in the form X.X.X

___header.description: Header passed through from the qobj with job metadata

___results.description: Corresponding results for array of experiments of the input qobj

___meas_return.description: Is the data averaged or from each shot

___status.description: Human-readable description of status of this experiment

___header.description: Header passed through from the qobj with experiment metadata

___shots.description: The starting and ending shot for this data. If there is only one shot to the experiment this is [1,1]

___success.description: If true, we can trust results for this experiment.

___counts.description: Histogram of the memory over the indicated shots

___snapshots.description: collection of all snapshots of simulator state

___job_id.description: Unique execution id from the backend

___success.description: True if complete input qobj executed correctly. (Implies each experiment success)
